title: Reduce Annies damage
body: It's just really stupid that a champion with no skill required can do the damage she does without any complexity.

replies.body: How is it bait, Annie literally requires no skill, but she has the easiest, highest instant burst in the game

> [{quoted}](name=KieshwaIII,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qli1ltqB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-09-07T12:37:34.895+0000)
>
> How is it bait, Annie literally requires no skill, but she has the easiest, highest instant burst in the game

i agree she is op

but reducing her damage makes her useless
cause damage is what she is primary picked for 

its like taking away damage from zed 


ps. she has low range and no mobility, thats the counterplay
a lot of people don't know that
i think something needs to be done about full mana refund on Q. making it a half refund would be a good start

Are you telling me that you cannot see the white circle glowing around her and try to keep AWAY from her? It's super easy, if she picks first, counter pick her. Or just hope for the best in normals.

She has 3 damaging attacks, one is her ult and can only stun every 4 attacks, if she has her stun ready and is not doing anything, watch out, a gank or flash may be incoming, or if you get to close you will feel it.

She really one has one attack that can actually be useful, the other is to short range and her ult, whilst it can be good, if it does not stun, misses, or she doesn't follow up, it is pointless. Force her to farm with her spells and catch her in between her stun and you should be right.
she will be getting a rework pretty sure riot said they are reworking all the old champs yorick, poppy, galio etc
That or reduce/remove CC or give her more counterplay/or skillshots. Either way, she definitely needs a nerf gun to the face.
